text:
@MMFlint 1 #covid dead in New Zealand? While USA has almost 2000 deaths everyday.  I think our  #Coronavirus task force has isolated themselves. Or not thinking outside the box.  Or just too arrogant and naive.
https://t.co/jWRL2FrmxC
